```{r}
#load packages ----
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#read in data ----
climate_data <- read_delim(here("clim.txt"), delim = " ")
```


```{r}
climate_summary <- climate_data %>%
  group_by(month, year) %>%
  summarize(total_precip = sum(precip),
            mean_tmax = mean(tmax_c),
            mean_tmin = mean(tmin_c)) %>%
  arrange(year)

head(climate_summary, n = 15)
```
